summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to housing for low-income households, adopting the 2010- 2011 Administrative and Financial Plan for 2009 Housing Levy Programs; establishing and modifying certain policies for use of funds for housing programs from other sources, including the 1986 Housing Levy, 1995 Housing Levy, and 2002 Housing Levy; and amending the Housing Policies appendix to the 2009-2012 Consolidated Plan for Housing and Community Development.
committee: Housing, Human Services, Health, and Culture
